discovered_sources.name: Global Wellness Institute

sample_content.title: 2025 Global Wellness Economy Monitor
sample_content.key_finding: Wellness economy reached $6.8 trillion in 2024, up 7.9% from 2023. Projected to reach $9.8 trillion by 2029. All 11 sectors recovered from pandemic.

discovered_sources.notes: Premier authority on wellness economy. Fills Spiritual/Social gap. High-quality free research reports.

discovered_sources.name: Journal of Contemplative Studies

sample_content.title: Contemplative practices and neuroscience research
sample_content.key_finding: Studies mindfulness, meditation, and contemplative traditions from scientific perspective

discovered_sources.notes: Strong academic journal for Spiritual category. Interdisciplinary approach combining neuroscience and contemplative traditions.

discovered_sources.name: Center for Mind and Culture - Spirit Tech

sample_content.title: Brain-based technologies for spiritual enhancement
sample_content.key_finding: Exploring neurostimulation, VR, and AI for inducing spiritual experiences. Market projected to reach $4.84B by 2030, $10B by 2040.

discovered_sources.notes: Cutting-edge intersection of technology and spirituality. Unique perspective on 'cyborg spirituality'.

discovered_sources.notes: Tier 1 quality. Massive data repository. Fills Social/Political research gap.
